Village Hotel Sentosa Village Hotel Sentosa offers an energetic, fun and vibrant stay for families, as well as leisure and meeting groups providing opportunities to discover the rich culture and heritage of its surroundings. There are 4 unique themed pools and special recreational activities such as scavenger hunt, pool games, fitness classes and movie night by the pool are available in the hotel precinct ensuring that everyone has a fun-filled time.
